text: Chandpur Medical College is a government medical college in Chandpur District, Bangladesh, founded in 2018 and affiliated with Chittagong Medical University. The class of the first batch of 50 students was commenced on January 10, 2019 on its temporary campus of Chandpur Sadar Hospital. ==References== Category:Medical colleges in Bangladesh Category:Chandpur District Category:Education in Bangladesh
title: Chandpur Medical College
